title: Prince of the Clouds
features: In a beautiful, romantic novel of post-war Italy, Slavatore Dragonara puts his training in military stragegy to the test when his love for a woman embroils him in a bitter war between a group of peasants and their boss's hired mercenaries. Reprint.
description: Gianni Riotta is a novelist and journalist, and is the co-editor of La Stampa, one of Italy's leading newspapers. He lives in Turin and New York.
store: Gianni Riotta (Author),  Matteo Pericoli (Illustrator),  Stephen Sartarelli (Translator)
